page.title: 16SERVICES IN CRICK
page.content: {Crick Funeral Service.}The Funeral Director followed the family tradition which goes back 5 generations. A typical Day's work would be to answer calls,arrange,prepare and attend funerals.Corpses have been collected from as far away as Germany,Italy and the USA. {The Salon.}The hairdresser has always wanted her own Salon.She has to have special tools to work with.They are made for profesional use.A typical day's work would be to take calls, cutting,perming,blow drying, colouring and setting all types of hair and cleaning everything in the evening. {Crick Taxi Service.}They travel around the Warwickshire/Northamptonshire area.Each day a driver takes the mini bus to collect girls from school. Passengers have been taken as far as Belfast in Northern Ireland.
